review: Love it, but just days after I bought it I saw a prime members-only sale on it! :/ Just my luck, I had been waiting to buy this, and once I finally did, it went on sale immediately afterward. Otherwise, very happy with my purchase-it solved my problem without having to spend too much money. I do wish it had a web browser, and the miracast/screen mirroring does not work well AT ALL (which I am hoping they will be updating to fix it soon or something), but other than that, I am generally satisfied with the fire stick.
